reviews.review_text:
Shack is spacious and has tasty food. Prices are a bit higher side. Very very close to the beach. Can feel the sound. Most of the shacks are like this at this beach. Service was fast during less crowded(i am not sure about when the crowd is more or moderate).

Backside parking is available.

Wonderful experience. Was there for 2 days, ordered beer, cocktails, omelette, butter chicken. Butter chicken was just awesome. Is a bit distant from the hustle bustle of the crowd and water sports, so a great place to enjoy the beach and the shack's hospitality!!!

It's relatively good place for having a rest. They have a lot of deck chairs. You can also ask that shack's stuff to book any deck chair for morning.
Food quality is okay. Time of waiting for food is about 20-30 minutes but for some position it can take more time. Waiters don't warn about time of waiting that's why I recommend to ask them about it.
They don't have ground coffe, only Nescafe.
Also I would recommend to instruct waiters about order of bringing food and drinks because by default they bring any drinks first and then food.
